characterList.description: A young woman with brown hair tied in a bun, wearing a gray t-shirt with 'FLORIDA ATLANTIC' printed on it.
characterList.name: Gabby Sacco

content_metadata.description: A video featuring Gabby Sacco, a junior at FAU and a softball player, discussing her daily routine and involvement with Basepath.

qAndA.answer: She usually has Dunkin Donuts or a bagel.
qAndA.question: What does Gabby usually have for breakfast?
What time does Gabby typically arrive at the athletic center?

qAndA.answer: She changes, listens to music, and receives any necessary treatment.
qAndA.question: What does Gabby do in the locker room before practice?
What organization did Gabby recently sign up for?

qAndA.answer: By conducting softball camps for Boca Little League two to three times a month.
qAndA.question: How does Gabby plan to use Basepath to give back to her community?

content_metadata.title: A Day in the Life of Gabby Sacco

trimmingSuggestions.description: The multiple cuts between the sports field and the athletic center in quick succession add little to the narrative and could be trimmed down to a single shot of Gabby walking and talking.

The static shot of Gabby standing in the same location for an extended period could be shortened, maintaining the audio but cutting away to more visually engaging shots, possibly B-roll related to her pre-practice activities.
Similar to Scene 3, the static shot could benefit from visual variation, possibly incorporating images or videos related to Basepath and the softball camps.

text_to_speech: hi I'm Gabby sacko I'm a junior here at FAU and I play softball so I wake up I normally get Dunkin Donuts or I'll have like a vle I'll get here around like 1 and if we have class we normally get like signed off of that like we don't have to go and then we'll get here we don't work out but it's almost like a little pump before we go out there stretching a bunch of stuff we'll change we'll listen to our music in there um I'll go do any treatment that I need to do and then go to the field so I just signed up on Bas path and I'm doing that through the boo little league for softball and um basically I'm just going to be doing camps with them twice three times a month and I use Bas path to do that deal with

timecoded_text_to_speech.text: Hi, I'm Gabi Sacco. I'm a junior here at FU and I play songfog.
So I wake up, I normally get dun-dun-dun on it,
or I'll have like a big ol' hooket here around like one.
And if we have class, we normally get like side off of that, like we don't have to go.
And then we'll get here, we don't work out,
but it's almost like a little pump on the top of the top there.
Stretching, bunch of stuff, full change,
and our music in there, I'll go do any treatment that I need to do,
and then go to the field.
So I just signed up on Basepad,
and I am doing that through the vocals little for the first softball,
and based on that I'm just going to be doing camps with them twice,
three times a month, and I use Basepad to do that for them.

youtube_description:
Gabby Sacco, a Florida Atlantic University softball player, walks us through her pregame routine & training facilities. 

Gabby uses Basepath to receive NIL deals from the FAU Paradise Collective, like volunteering with Boca Raton Little League.

Visit theparadisecollective.com to donate!
youtube_title: FAU Softball Player Gabby Sacco Pregame Routine and Training Facility
